Launch your tech career with our graduate programme

Good day,

I’m [SENDER_NAME] from Deriv, an international FinTech company specialising in online trading technology.

I’ve sent you an email a couple of weeks ago regarding BeSquare, our graduate training programme which is designed to provide fresh graduates with real-world work experience in the tech industry.

The programme
BeSquare is a 6-month paid training programme that consists of 10 technical modules conducted by our experienced staff. Participants will learn essential technical skills and soft skills, as well as get opportunities for international exposure through online collaboration with our overseas offices.

At the end of the programme, we’ll offer permanent positions to the intake’s top performers.

The trainers
Our teams, who will be training and working alongside participants, are made up of professionals who specialise in cybersecurity, front-end and back-end development, and other tech areas. By working on real-world challenges with these different teams, participants will get a chance to discover their strengths and interests. This will help them make better decisions when taking the first steps in their career.

Intake, eligibility, and application deadline
The first BeSquare intake is in August 2021* and is open only to Malaysians who are either final-term STEM students or fresh STEM graduates. Interested applicants can visit the BeSquare website to find out more and submit their application. Please note that the start date is subject to change if circumstances require it.

If you have any questions, please let me know. I’ll be happy to provide more information about BeSquare to you and your students.

Looking forward to your reply.

Thank you

[sender’s_name]

*Please note that the start date is subject to change if circumstances require it.
